definition: to put on a hat/to be first/to dub
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

pinyin: guan1 zhuang4 dong4 mai4 pang2 lu4 yi2 zhi2 shou3 shu4
containing_words.word: 冠狀動脈旁路移植手術

pinyin: guan1 zhuang4 dong4 mai4 pang2 tong1 shou3 shu4

sentences.english: Coronary disease is the coronal atherosclerosis heart disease's abbreviation.
sentences.chinese: 冠心病是冠狀動脈粥樣硬化性心臟病的簡稱。

sentences.english: Current smoking was the most significant independent predictor of coronary vasospasm.
sentences.chinese: 抽菸是最顯著的冠狀動脈痙攣預測因子。

sentences.english: Chapter 14 - How Long Should You Wait after Percutaneous Coronary Intervention for Noncardiac Surgery?
sentences.chinese: 皮冠狀動脈介入術後多久才能進行非心臟手術？

sentences.english: Postischemic recovery of coronary flow in group B was significantly reduced compared with group A.
sentences.chinese: 組缺血后冠狀動脈流量的恢復顯著低於A組。

sentences.english: In the control group, the sutures passed around the coronary artery but were not tied.
sentences.chinese: 在對照組，縫線繞過大鼠的冠狀動脈但不結紮。

sentences.english: Context The coronary artery calcium score (CACS) has been shown to predict future coronary heart disease (CHD) events.
sentences.chinese: 冠狀動脈鈣評分已經被用來預測未來冠心病事件。

sentences.english: Conclusion Mycobacterium tuberculosis can cause the lesion of coronary artery.
sentences.chinese: 結論結核菌能導致冠狀動脈的病理性損傷。

sentences.english: Single vessel disease was in 13 patients and the others were multi vessel disease.
sentences.chinese: 冠狀動脈單支病變13例，其餘爲多支病變。

sentences.english: The left descending branch of coronary artery of the rat was ligated to establish myocardium ischemic model.
sentences.chinese: 結紮大鼠冠狀動脈左前降支建立心肌缺血模型。

sentences.english: I generally don't recommend routine screening tests looking for coronary artery disease.
sentences.chinese: 一般我不建議用例行篩查試驗來尋找冠狀動脈疾病。

sentences.english: Forty-nine elective on-pump or off-pump coronary artery bypass graft surgery patients.
sentences.chinese: 四十九例選擇帶泵或去泵冠狀動脈搭橋手術患者。

sentences.english: The flow conditions representative of physiological states at a distal end-to-side anastomosis of a coronary artery-graft are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討冠狀動脈末梢對側邊移植接合處之血液流場。

sentences.english: The detection of coronary artery calcinosis increased with aging.
sentences.chinese: 冠狀動脈鈣質沉着隨着年齡的增長而增加。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship of tricuspid regurgitation and coronary artery stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討三尖瓣返流與冠狀動脈狹窄的關係。

sentences.english: These results suggested that Sanhuang mixture had the potential to dilate coronary artery with positive inotropic effect on myocardium.
sentences.chinese: 結果提示三黃合劑具有擴張冠狀動脈及正性肌力作用。

sentences.english: Does coronary artery bypass grafting cure cardiovascular disease?
sentences.chinese: 通過冠狀動脈移植來治療心血管疾病嗎？

choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
